#labels Phase-Implementation
= application flow =



  * an .htaccess with a simple rewrite rule send all requests to the main index.php (system gateway)
  * index.php (system gateway) include a configuration file and the rpd superclass 
  * the superclass include and instance a controller, then invoke one of its methods (following the requested uri)
  * the method call a view to send an output


== use case ==

 * user request http://myhost/blog/welcome/
 * apache parse .htaccess in application root then call index.php if /controller/method/ isn't a valid file or folder
 * index include framework files, then the application controller: /controllers/blog.php
 * superclass instance "Blog" class then invoke $Blog->welcome()
 * welcome method call instalce a view (include a php file and print some data)
